metadata.Title: CVE-2017-0372 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Parameters injection in the SyntaxHighlight extension of Mediawiki before 1.23.16, 1.27.3 and 1.28.2 might result in multiple vulnerabilities.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-0372` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.27.4-3
mediawiki-classes - 1:1.27.4-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.27.4-3').
